CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: We realized a slightly bathochromic shift of the PIDT - DTNT absorbance relative to that of the PIDT - EHNT , which was in consistent with the trend realized in solution , while PIDT-C12NT showed a pronounced bathochromic shift of the low energy band absorption with λ max moved from 593 nm in solution to 619 nm as thin film.

Let's think step by step.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Sure, here's the updated table with the valid entities that clearly refer to "Material name" in the given paragraph:

| --- |
| PIDT-DTNT |
| PIDT-EHNT |
| PIDT-C12NT |

I removed "absorbance" and "solution" from the table as they do not clearly refer to material names.

Paragraph: We realized a slightly bathochromic shift of the PIDT - DTNT absorbance relative to that of the PIDT - EHNT , which was in consistent with the trend realized in solution , while PIDT-C12NT showed a pronounced bathochromic shift of the low energy band absorption with λ max moved from 593 nm in solution to 619 nm as thin film.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

* "solution" (this is a state of matter, not a property)

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: We realized a slightly bathochromic shift of the PIDT - DTNT absorbance relative to that of the PIDT - EHNT , which was in consistent with the trend realized in solution , while PIDT-C12NT showed a pronounced bathochromic shift of the low energy band absorption with λ max moved from 593 nm in solution to 619 nm as thin film.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| λ max (PIDT-C12NT) | 593 nm (in solution) |
| λ max (PIDT-C12NT) | 619 nm (as thin film) |
| PIDT - DTNT absorbance | slightly bathochromic shift |
| PIDT - EHNT absorbance | consistent with the trend in solution |

Note: λ max represents the wavelength of the maximum absorbance.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Value of material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Sure, here's the updated table with the valid entities that clearly refer to "Value of material property":

| Property Value |
| --- |
| λ max (PIDT-C12NT) | 593 nm (in solution) |
| λ max (PIDT-C12NT) | 619 nm (as thin film) |

The other entities mentioned in the paragraph, such as "PIDT - DTNT absorbance" and "PIDT - EHNT absorbance", do not clearly refer to the value of a material property and have been removed from the table.
